name: Hybrid Core
description: A Node.js framework for building high-performance, scalable apps with a suite of development tools.

name: Hybrid Ui
description: A cutting-edge web front-end framework for building high-performance, memory-safe, and visually stunning applications with streamlined development and exceptional user experiences.

name: Hybrid Theme Builder
description: A theme builder for Hybrid UI, allowing developers to create custom themes for their applications.
